patterns: How can I reset my password?
responses: You can reset your password here: https://example.com/reset

patterns: How do I get a refund?

patterns: How can I reach customer service?
responses: You can contact us at support@example.com or call us at +123456789.

patterns: Tell me about your subscription options
responses: We offer multiple subscription plans. Visit our pricing page to compare features and benefits: https://example.com/pricing

patterns: How can I track my order?
I want to track my order
responses: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email after shipping.
Use the tracking number sent to your email to track your order here: https://example.com/track

patterns: How do I cancel an order?
I want to cancel my order
responses: If your order hasn't shipped yet, you can cancel it from your orders page.
You can cancel your order from your account page if it hasn't been shipped yet.

patterns: How do I return an item?
I want to return an item
How can I return a product?
responses: To return an item, go to your order history and select 'Return Item' next to the product.
You can initiate a return from your order history page by clicking on 'Return Item'.
